name: Webhook Bot
description: A discord bot that allows a very select number of users access webhooks for the purpose of playing characters or making funny jokes. Easy to install and easy to use. Usable on any number of servers.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The token generated by the discord developer portal that links this code to the usable discord bot profile.

DEBUG_LOG.description: The channel to log debug messages to.

INFO_LOG.description: Same as debug log but for more verbose messages.

WEBHOOKS_USERS.description: A comma-separated list of discord user IDs, listing the people that are allowed to use the bot's proper functionality. Does not include the owner by default so make sure to add your name to the list!
